traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: Blagothkus has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: Blagothkus can innately cast the following spells (spell save DC 15), requiring no material components: * 3/day each: fog cloud, levitate

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: Blagothkus is a 5th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). Blagothkus has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list: * Cantrips (at will): light, mage hand, prestidigitation * 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, magic missile, shield * 2nd level (3 slots): gust of wind, misty step, shatter * 3rd level (2 slots): fly, lightning bolt

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Blagothkus attacks twice with his morningstar.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage.
